Smart glasses: Integrate advanced technology, such as GPS, voice commands, and augmented reality, into the glasses to enhance the user experience.
Customizable lenses: Allow users to choose from a variety of lens tints and colors to suit their specific needs and preferences.
Anti-fog coating: Apply a specialized coating to the lenses to prevent fogging up, especially in humid conditions.
Prescription-free glasses: Design glasses that do not require a prescription, catering to those who do not need corrective lenses.
Eye-tracking technology: Incorporate eye-tracking technology into the glasses to improve reading and navigation, making it easier for users to focus on the content they are reading.
